name: Escape Hard Time Jail: Prison
description:
Escape hard Time Jail Prison is a 3D free game with missions to accomplish in limited time. It is a game of genius players who are keen to make strategies and escape from hard core prisons.
You are a powerful skilled agent of an agency and were sentenced to a jail of 10 years. As the authorities brought you here, you have started to lose mind and it is already killing you by giving you a hard time. Now your life mission is to escape this maximum security jail while you still have to be invisible when you take a step to bypass the boundaries. You are being watched by CCTV cameras, Canine units and prison guards at all times. Take calculated steps to reach to guards where they are standing alone. Hide from the cameras and be like a stealth. Do not get caught instead try to get out of this pit.

Jailer is a brutal person who when finds someone escaping, just kills him in encounter. Steels wires are all around the heighted walls and it aint easy to escape the jail. It’s a hard time and you got to make it till when you are free.

Features
3D free game
Jail prison environment
Strategy required for missions
Missions to accomplish
Real life sound effects
Different weapons to be snatched.
